claim: The Mexican attacker commented on a photograph of the youtuber, this after being eliminated from the World CupAfter the elimination of Mexico at the hands of Brazil in the Eighth World Cup Finals of Russia, the tricolor attacker Javier Hernández did not hesitate to leave a compliment to the youtuber Yuya. The influencer also published a photograph of his stay in world championship lands and the Chicharito took advantage to comment on the image with some emojis of some flames. Several Instagram users noticed this fact and began to speculate and hint if both characters had a relationship, as the West Ham attacker is currently single after his break-up with Spanish actress Andrea Duro. Currently, Hernández left the concentration of the Tricolor in Moscow with the rest of his companions and will have a few days of vacation before joining the preseason of the Hammers. I'm sorry.
